author: SilverSandstone

game.name: asuna
game.short_description: A vibrant world of beautiful biomes. Explore, discover, create.
game.title: Asuna

game.author: mt-mods
game.name: dreambuilder_game
game.short_description: Dreambuilder is my attempt to give the player pretty much everything they could ever want to build with, and all the tools they should need to actually get the job done.
game.title: Dreambuilder Game

game.author: MeseCraft
game.name: mesecraft
game.short_description: Work in Progress. The best game for Minetest. A survival game with new depth, mechanics, biomes, mobs and many essential additions. Has a focus on being fun, user-friendly, stable, and minimalist but featured.
game.title: MeseCraft

game.author: Luanti
game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

game.author: Wuzzy
game.name: repixture
game.short_description: Simplistic sandbox survival game that plays in mostly lush biomes in a mostly peaceful world and only simple technologies.
game.title: Repixture

game.author: duckgo
game.name: survivetest
game.short_description: Work in Progress. Construction, mining, farming , exploration, kill the monsters, defeat the bosses, complete achievements and get prizes. And most importantly, have fun!
game.title: Survivetest

game.author: Casimir
game.name: voxelgarden
game.short_description: A classic game for exploring, survival and building. Maintained by rudzik8
game.title: Voxelgarden

long_description:
Raw Ore Blocks adds compressed block forms of metal lumps.
These blocks can be used for efficient storage or decoration.

The following games and mods are supported:

- Minetest Game
- Mesecraft
- Dreambuilder
- Repixture
- Survivetest
- More Ores
- Technic
- Techage
- Glooptest
- Nether
name: lumpblocks
short_description: Adds block forms of metal lumps.
title: Raw Ore Blocks
